1. Page Structure and Layout (18/20): Clear, minimalist structure with easy navigation and well-separated sections.
2. Depth and Quality of Content (14/20): Basic overview, but needs more detailed information for in-depth understanding.
3. Usage of Notion Features (17/20): Effective use of databases, links, and visual icons to organize content.
4. Visual Elements (15/20): Simple visual elements used effectively, but lacks diversity in media.
5. Readability and Accessibility (16/20): Text is clear and accessible, but some pages could benefit from more detailed descriptions.
